item_1A:
ITEM 1A. RISK FACTORS
Under current SEC rules and regulations, as a smaller reporting company, we are not required to provide risk factor disclosure in this Report or in any of our periodic reports until such time as we no longer qualify as a smaller reporting company. If and when we next file a registration statement on Form S-1 in connection with an offering of securities, we will include risk factor disclosure as part of that filing.
